name: Backyard Battles
description:
For Windows Users: 

  1. After downloading the game, extract all the files by using an extract tool onto your computer. 
  2. Now run the Backyard_Battles.exe file in the Backyard_Battles(Windows) folder to play the game!

Note: If on running the game, it says "publisher not recognized", then click on "More Info" and then "Run anyways"

For Mac Users:

  1. After downloading the game, double click the Backyard Battles(Mac) folder, this should extract the file.
  2. Now run the Backyard Battles(Mac) file to play the game!

Note: If on running the game, it says "app cannot be scanned for malicious software", then go to your settings-> privacy and security -> open anyways
